description: LabPlot is a KDE-application for interactive graphing and analysis of scientific data.

script: Start-Process -Wait -WindowStyle Hidden cmd "/c call `"$dir\labplot-2.7.0-64bit-setup.exe`" --msiparams INSTALLDIR=`"$dir`" REBOOT=ReallySuppress --silent && icacls `"$dir`" /grant Everyone:F /T " -Verb RunAs
$id = wmic product where """name like 'LabPlot%'""" get IdentifyingNumber | find /i """-"""
Start-Process -Wait -WindowStyle Hidden cmd "/c msiexec /x $id /qn && icacls `"$dir`" /grant Everyone:F /T" -Verb RunAs
